name: Food Street - Restaurant Game
description:
Welcome to Food Street, a free restaurant management world that puts you in charge of your own cafe, bakery or restaurant! Build the restaurant of your dreams in a stunning 3D world.

Every customer is different, and wants a different restaurant experience! Customize, design and build your own kitchen and start cooking with a huge selection of fresh ingredients. Build a bakery to bake tasty dishes from all around the world, or create a 5-star restaurant that meets everyone’s appetite! Visit friends, trade items with other restaurant owners around town and play together in friendly online competitions!

Keep everyone in town happy as you bake, cook and do even more in Food Street!

---------------------------
GAME FEATURES
---------------------------

Build, Decorate & Manage a World-Famous Restaurant!
• Your restaurant could become world-famous!
• Design your dream restaurant from the ground up in this scrumptious cooking game!
• Customize your restaurant with your own personal touches.
• Get cooking! Bake tasty foods from cupcakes to lobster rolls for your hungry customers!
• Tons of restaurant options – Build a bakery with the Bread Oven, a cozy cafe with the Breakfast Stove, or even your own Smoothie Bar!

Farm for Fresh Ingredients Like Milk & Eggs!
• Keep your garden growing! Farm fresh ingredients like tomatoes, garlic and other vegetables from your own personal garden!
• Lots of hungry customers? Expand your garden to keep the food craze alive!
• Bake tasty dishes from around the world with home-grown ingredients!
• Build up a supply of your own livestock and collect ingredients like eggs, milk, wheat and more!

Hire Your Own Chef & Wait Staff!
• Upgrade your restaurant and keep your customers happy with good service and great meals.
• Hire a chef for all the cooking and a great wait staff that can dash around and take orders!
• Unlock and purchase new uniforms for your employees from other shops in town!

Trade Ingredients & Dishes with Friends!
• Your town is great, but it’s better when your friends help!
• Trade ingredients to help each other out and support one another’s businesses.
• Expand your menu to keep everyone in your town full and happy!

Collaborate in Food Clubs & Compete in Friendly Competitions!
• Prove that your restaurant is the best by cooking the best dish!
• Compete against other restaurant owners to see which chef can cook the tastiest dishes and come out on top!

Prepare Your Cafe with Seasonal Events, Themed Dishes & Decorations!
• Keep your business looking snazzy with decorations that you can purchase for your restaurant!
• Prepare your restaurant for special events and celebrations with seasonal decorations and special events!
• Get ready for limited events during seasonal periods and fun, holiday-themed activities

Collect & Share Stickers with Your Friends!
• Share beautifully illustrated stickers to everyone in your contacts list and spread the news of your restaurant to all of your friends.

Join the food craze by building your own bakery, café or restaurant! Keep people in your town happy and full by cooking some of the best foods from around the world in Food Street!

So what are you waiting for? Start running your own business today by downloading Food Street!

PLEASE NOTE: Food Street is free to download. However, purchases can be made in the game for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device settings. A network connection is required to play.

---------------------------
SUPPORT
---------------------------

If you’re having problems with Food Street, we’re very sorry. Our friendly team is ready to help! Please visit: http://www.supersolid.co.uk/forum/index.php?forums/feedback.26/
